acf.egsr_quicktip: YOUR SIXTH SENSE IS YOUR SUPERPOWER BUT CAN ALSO KNOCK YOU OFF BALANCE.
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
Wow, {FIRSTNAME}...

It’s quite beautiful to tune into a fellow empathic soul that resonates so deeply with others.

You can sense the emotional currents around you... intuitively understanding how other people are feeling, oftentimes picking up on incredibly subtle hints and gestures.

But this is just one layer of who you are isn’t it {FIRSTNAME}?

I also sense a logical, intelligent, highly creative being… constantly buzzing with new ideas…

You have a very strong sense of right and wrong which guides you well.

And you are so insightful, {FIRSTNAME}! I’m sure people constantly ask your advice on pretty much anything and everything...

You also have a sixth sense of somehow intuitively knowing exactly what other people need, while your "live and let live" approach makes them feel accepted as they are.

You love to nurture others, without expecting anything in return. It’s just your nature to give and give some more.

Karma is on your side, and you’re sure to get help back when you need it…

But... there’s something blocking your path to living the life you truly desire and were born to live.

Blocking you from fulfilling your destiny...

I can sense an imbalance in your energy… something you need to work through.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
{FIRSTNAME} I can feel your energy flowing to others, and this is a beautiful thing…

But... you must remember to nourish yourself.

Because you sense the pain of others… your generous soul reaches out naturally to help those who are down on their luck... but this noble trait can deplete you.

For how can you give energy and compassion to others… when you don’t have enough for yourself?

{FIRSTNAME}, I sense you sometimes find it hard to say no.

This is a place where many empathic souls can draw in negative energy…

If you say “yes” when you really should say “no” you can end up not only drained, but also feeling resentful.

And deep inside your soul knows…

~ It’s far better to say no, than let people down after committing.
~ It’s far better to focus on self-care… when you need to recharge.

And there’s an incredibly important place your energy needs directing to… which can get blocked off when you feel low… Your Deep Creativity.

This is your true link to the flow and wonder your soul needs… to truly feel whole.

I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding finding that balance to protect your energy so you can complete your life mission.

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And the way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading…

I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
Your light reading is STRONG {FIRSTNAME}, and meant to brighten the world. Not only by helping out others, but by expressing your creativity.

I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

You’re in tune with the magic of everyday existence, the realm of dreams and the great beyond… and you soul NEEDS to tell these stories.

Whether through music, words, a form of art, or another creative project.

Creativity connects you deeply to yourself, making sense of your emotions and your world.

But... to create you need to feel balanced.

And balance only comes when you take care of yourself.

You can learn to nourish yourself, to tune into what you really want, to pass through the blocks… uplifting yourself AND uplifting others…

Then you can truly shine your creative light out to the world and share your gifts.

Only then will you feel complete.

Only then will you fulfill your destiny.
